Name: Green Glazier
Ingredients: 10 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
7.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This cognac-laced herbal and chocolatey bite-sized libation may leave you glazed but pleased - pleasured even.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Jamie Boudreau at Vessel, Seattle, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Glazier contains 157 calories
